posts.post_title: FS T206 Magee Sovereign 150 PSA 4 ($old) and SGC 4
posts.post_content:
Currently in REA there is a T206 Magee Sov 150 PSA 4 up for sale with bidding up to $2100 (over $2600 with buyers premium and shipping and tax) with an entire day to go.  

I have both a PSA 4 ($old) and SGC 4 and would sell either or both for $2100 each pp ff postage included.  They can be seen here:

[url]https://imgur.com/a/9BV68rH[/url]

PM or email at [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks for looking.

Bob Intrieri
